itemListElement.name: Vegan Turmeric Lassi – Golden Yogurt Drink

@graph.name: Turmeric Lassi - Golden Yogurt Drink
@graph.description: Turmeric Lassi - Golden Yogurt Drink. Lassi is a yogurt based drink served as a beverage in India. This version uses non dairy yogurt, turmeric, black pepper and ginger for a cooling Lassi. Vegan Gluten-free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup almond milk or coconut milk frozen into cubes (1 heaping cup cubes)
a good dash of black pepper
1 tbsp or more sweetener (sugar, maple, coconut sugar etc)
1 tsp candied ginger  (or 1/2 tsp fresh peeled ginger)

recipeInstructions.text: Add everything to the blender, Blend for a minute until smooth. Taste and adjust sweet and blend for 15 seconds. Pour into serving glasses. Add ice cubes if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Add everything to the blender, Blend for a minute until smooth. Taste and adjust sweet and blend for 15 seconds. Pour into serving glasses. Add ice cubes if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Add a pinch of turmeric and pepper to garnish or top with some whipped coconut cream. Serve immediately.
